title: The Bridges of Madison County
creator_credit: Clint Eastwood, Kathleen Kennedy, Malpaso Company and Amblin Entertainment
brief_description: Robert Kincaid (Clint Eastwood) is a photographer for National Geographic on assignment shooting the old bridges of Madison County. He meets Francesca Johnson (Meryl Streep), a farm wife whose husband and children have gone away for a week and the two fall in love. Both realise that their love is special but that their lives can only touch for a few short days. Based on the best selling heart warming novel by Robert James Waller.
